description: AAEON has introduced the PICO-ASL4 and GENE-ASL6 boards, both incorporating the Intel Atom x7000RE Processor Series (Amston Lake). These boards are optimized for edge applications, combining durability, scalability, and low power consumption with a maximum power draw of 12W per processor. The PICO-ASL4, built on the 100mm x 72mm PICO-ITX form factor, supports Intel Atom […]
title: AAEON’s PICO & GENE Boards with Intel Atom x7000RE Processors
